author: infektedpc
name: Winter-Mint
description:
Theme Based Off of bimsebasse's Nadia Theme

This The Is A Dark Theme With Blue Highilights and Grey Accents.

Some Svg's Been Changed As Well

I Did this mainly for myself but thought hey why not share it with you guys

Updated Hilight Color when something needs attention

Name Change

Updated Ripple Color

To Install Extract folder in ~/.themes or /usr/share/themes

Best Used With Winter-Mint Gtk3 Theme Found Here.

faenza darker icon set is best used with this theme.

Fixed Issue With Side Bar for linux mint 15!
